channel.title: Hoster needed for earthscape
channel.description:
Hi, we currently need about 2 hosters to host the famous "Earthscape". Needs to have a quite fast computer and a person who knows what they are doing, We need 1 hoster that can use no-ip, and 1 hoster with hamachi. Server is testscape based.
The server includes Full membership is working , all skills working , no glitches on armor , pvp emote to allow ppl pking everywhere , flying skill , many mini games , modcity and MUCH MUCH MORE!
The hoster/hosters will recive admin on the server. So, if you think you have what it takes, please email me (co-owner) on dylan.cwd@gmail.com Or the Owner (i_loot_i) on : i_loot_i@hotmail.com
Must be on for atleast 2 hrs aday! Thanks Earthscape Co-owner. Mod ikick
